note:
I have my own views. I try to be loving to anyone and everyone. And I try to be a good follower of Christ. I am open to respectful conversation and I'll always try to listen.
Other things I enjoy include
- trying new and good foods.
- good liturature (Lord of the Rings, anything written by Brandon Sanderson)
- open source projects (Markor, Nextcloud, Manjaro, KDE)
- board games (Dominion, Seven Wonders)
- video games (Helldivers, Deep Rock Galactic, Torchlight 2)
